mapper.update: UPDATE student SET stu_phone = #{phone}, stu_email = #{email} WHERE stu_id = #{userId};
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT c.class_grade FROM student s JOIN class c ON s.class_id = c.class_id JOIN teacher_class_course tcc ON c.class_id = tcc.class_id WHERE stu_id = COALESCE(#{userId}, stu_id) AND c.class_id = COALESCE(#{classId}, c.class_id) AND tcc.t_id = #{tId};

SELECT DISTINCT c.class_name AS "label", c.class_id AS "value" FROM student s JOIN class c ON s.class_id = c.class_id JOIN teacher_class_course tcc ON c.class_id = tcc.class_id WHERE stu_id = COALESCE(#{userId}, stu_id) AND c.class_grade = COALESCE(#{grade}, c.class_grade) AND tcc.t_id = #{tId};

SELECT s.stu_id AS "userId", s.stu_name AS "userName", s.stu_age AS "age", s.stu_gender AS "gender", s.stu_phone AS "phone", s.stu_email AS "email", c.class_grade AS "grade", c2.college_name AS "collegeName", m.major_name AS "majorName", c.class_name AS "className" FROM student s JOIN class c ON s.class_id = c.class_id JOIN major m on m.major_id = c.major_id JOIN college c2 on c2.college_id = m.college_id JOIN teacher_class_course tcc ON c.class_id = tcc.class_id WHERE stu_id = COALESCE(#{userId}, stu_id) AND c.class_grade = COALESCE(#{grade}, c.class_grade) AND c.class_id = COALESCE(#{classId}, c.class_id) AND tcc.t_id = #{tId};
SELECT stu_id AS "userId", stu_name AS "userName", stu_phone AS "phone", stu_email AS "email" FROM student WHERE stu_id = #{userId};
